title: Rahu Transit in the 8th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 8th house for Taurus Ascendant triggers intense focus on hidden matters, sudden changes, and psychological depth. This phase brings fascination with secrets, research, and taboo subjects, while exposing vulnerabilities linked to joint finances and trust. Unexpected events may disrupt stability, demanding adaptability. Emotional intensity increases, often accompanied by anxiety or obsession. When handled with awareness and discipline, Rahu supports deep transformation, investigative ability, and the capacity to navigate uncertainty without losing balance.

sections.heading: Research & Hidden Knowledge
points: Attraction to occult or taboo topics

closing: Rahu in the 8th house intensifies change and depth. Conscious awareness turns disruption into powerful inner transformation.
